faq_new_subtitle: Everything you need to know about ZipRenamer
faq1_new_a: Yes! ZipRenamer is 100% free during beta. All features including pattern variables, advanced scoping, and unlimited files are available at no cost.
faq_extract_q: How is this different from extracting my ZIP?
faq_extract_a: When you extract a ZIP, you're creating thousands of files on disk, which takes time and uses storage. ZipRenamer processes your archive in-memory—we read the structure, apply renames, and build a new ZIP without ever writing files to disk. It's faster, safer, and requires zero cleanup.
faq_folders_a: Absolutely! Use the "All Folders" scope or target specific folder names. You can rename both files AND folders in the same rule group, or create separate rules for each.
faq2_new_a: Your files never leave your computer. We process everything client-side in your browser. The ZIP is briefly uploaded to our server for renaming, then immediately deleted. We don't store, log, or have any access to your file contents. GDPR compliant.
faq3_new_a: No installation required. ZipRenamer runs entirely in your browser. Just visit the site, drop your ZIP, and start renaming. Works on Windows, Mac, and Linux.
faq_variables_a: Pattern variables let you build dynamic filenames using placeholders:
rule_replace_desc: Find and replace text in filenames
rule_prefix_desc: Add text at the beginning of filenames
rule_suffix_desc: Add text at the end (before extension)
rule_remove_special_desc: Remove special characters (keep letters, numbers, - and _)
rule_pattern_desc: Use variables to build dynamic filenames
